General.Name: Firering Strategic Minerals Plc
General.Description: Firering Strategic Minerals PLC engages in the exploration and development of mineral projects in the West Africa. The company primarily explores for lithium, coltan, tantalum, and niobium assets. Its flagship project is the Atex Lithium-Tantalum project that covers an area of 134.96 km2 located in Cote d'Ivoire. The company was formerly known as Firering Holdings Limited. The company was incorporated in 2019 and is based in Nicosia, Cyprus.
General.Address: Immeuble Arc-en-ciel 2eme Etage, Abidjan, Ivory Coast
